body_html: So for non-tensor base, it falls back to the TH/THC-originated function pow (which is there as pow in addition to the native pow). That doesn't have a derivative. I'll try just adding the derivative first.
body_text: So for non-tensor base, it falls back to the TH/THC-originated function pow (which is there as pow in addition to the native pow). That doesn't have a derivative. I'll try just adding the derivative first.
body: So for non-tensor base, it falls back to the TH/THC-originated function pow (which is there as `pow` in addition to the native `pow`). That doesn't have a derivative. I'll try just adding the derivative first.
